1. Cardiovasc Diabetol. 2025 Mar 5;24(1):107. doi: 10.1186/s12933-025-02658-z.

A one-week reduced-carbohydrate diet to mitigate iatrogenic peripheral 
hyperinsulinemia does not improve insulin sensitivity or endothelial function in 
a randomized, crossover trial in patients with type 1 diabetes.
